net.sf.briar.api.i18n
Interface I18n.Listener

All Known Implementing Classes:
DirectoryChooserPanel, TextPanel, Wizard, WizardPanel, WorkerPanel
Enclosing interface:
I18n
public static interface I18n.Listener

Implemented by classes that wish to be informed of changes to the i18n locale.

Method Summary

          Called whenever the i18n locale changes.

Called whenever the i18n locale changes.
